svg.text: MOBILE-FIRST DESIGN - TOUCH TARGETS AND PERFORMANCE

g.text: No hover-dependent interactions. All actions accessible via tap.
Tooltips appear on long-press for mobile users.
All interactive elements meet 44x44px minimum touch target
size with 8px spacing between adjacent controls.
Fast page loads on 3G/4G. LCP under 2.5s,
Total page under 1MB, critical content under 500KB.
44x44px targets | 8px spacing | No hover dependency | LCP 2.5s | FID 100ms | CLS 0.1 | TTI 5s | 1MB budget
